eu.amidst.core.utils

Interface AmidstOptionsHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BayesianNetworkSampler, DynamicIS_Scalability, ParallelPC, ParallelTAN

    public interface AmidstOptionsHandler
    This interface handles the different possible options or parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String classNameID()
      Returns the name of this class.
      default boolean getBooleanOption(String optionName)
      Returns the boolean value of an option given its name.

      Returns the double value of an option given its name.

      Returns the int value of an option given its name.

      Returns the String value of an option given its name.

      Returns the list of options.
      String listOptionsRecursively()
      Returns the list of options recursively.
      static String listOptionsRecursively(Class obj)
      Returns recursively the list of options of a given a Class instance.
      void loadOptions()
      Loads the options.
      default void loadOptionsFromFile(String fileName)
      Loads the list of options from a given file name.
      default void setOptions(String[] args)
      Sets the option list.
